diff.author: Tammy Dugan
diff.description: Creates linkage table needed by patient matching.
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE `linkagetable` ( `mrn` varchar(255) default NULL, `ln` varchar(255) default NULL, `lny` varchar(255) default NULL, `fn` varchar(255) default NULL, `yb` varchar(255) default NULL, `mb` varchar(255) default NULL, `db` varchar(255) default NULL, `sex` varchar(255) default NULL, `race` varchar(255) default NULL, `city` varchar(255) default NULL, `st` varchar(255) default NULL, `zip` varchar(255) default NULL, `tel` varchar(255) default NULL, `nkln` varchar(255) default NULL, `nkfn` varchar(255) default NULL, `drid` varchar(255) default NULL, `drln` varchar(255) default NULL, `drfn` varchar(255) default NULL, `openmrs_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`openmrs_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: surangak
diff.description: Adding several tables as part of efforts to move database reports into the database
diff.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `patientmatching_configuration`; CREATE TABLE `patientmatching_configuration` ( `configuration_id` int AUTO_INCREMENT, `configuration_name` varchar(255) default NULL, `random_sample_size` int default NULL, `using_random_sample` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`configuration_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `patientmatching_configurationEntries`; CREATE TABLE `patientmatching_configurationEntries` ( `entry_id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `field_view_name` varchar(255) default NULL, `field_name` varchar(255) default NULL, `inclusion` varchar(255) default NULL, `block_order` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `flag` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `configuration_key` int default NULL, INDEX `par_ind`(`configuration_key`), FOREIGN KEY (`configuration_key`) REFERENCES `patientmatching_configuration`(`configuration_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
